rankings.commentary: Evan Chase left no doubt that he is clearly #1.  Stomping out his computer opponent was a convincing way to start the season with 350 yards through the air against a Clemson team that was a top ten computer based contender.

Looking to be another top dawg this season, having been demoted to the West Coast. Brooks and his men carried out a tough fight, losing by 6 to the fourth ranked computer based Bulldogs of UGA before convincingly winning against the Badgers at home.  He's just starting to get rolling averaging 430 yards per game.
Dan is eyeing making a name for himself.  Couldn't quite get it done against computer based  #14 BYU who held the minister to 96 rushing yards.

An overrated Oline.  A defense that just can't seem to get a stop.  Throwing crap against the wall and it's just not working. The Badgers look not so bowl-worthy after consecutive losses to a computer based TAMU team and a sluggish Brooks Ore coached Cardinal.
While the Lion-Hearted Playstation trouble maker was hoping to start off strong, the computer based Alabama rolled on through the Gophers.  Welcome to the league Mr. Clinard.

stats.nextOpponent: vs FSU (Computer), vs #2 Penn State (Computer), @ USC (Jacob)

rankings.commentary: Stomped out by a computer based Iowa team is not a good look to the start of this season.  Watch out though - he's been practicing.

stats.nextOpponent: vs # 2 Penn State (Computer), vs Stanford (Brooks), at #3 Ohio State (Computer)
